license_notes: User-provided seed list for normalization bootstrap.
Free tier terms apply; do not republish restricted payloads.
API terms apply; mostly club data, country mapping is heuristic.
Open-source mirror of FIFA ranking history (source repository attribution required; validate terms for redistribution).
OpenFootball open data. Parsed from raw GitHub files (cup_finals.txt/cup.txt) with optional local seed fallback data/raw/world_cup/world_cup_top4_seed.csv.

Primary source requested by user: KeithGalli Olympics Dataset (CC BY 4.0 in repository README), but this file currently stops at year 2022 and has no Paris 2024 rows. Paris 2024 event-level medals are ingested from taniki/paris2024-data.

Primary historical source: KeithGalli Olympics Dataset (repository indicates CC BY 4.0). Supplementary sources: taniki/paris2024-data for Paris 2024 event medals and Wikipedia 2026 Winter Olympics medal winners seed.
Open-source mirrors of FIFA women's ranking snapshots (source repository attribution required; validate terms for redistribution).
World Rugby rankings API snapshots plus legacy men historical CSV mirror (respect platform terms and attribution).

source_name: FIFA Women's World Cup Historical Results
license_notes: Historical top4 seed from local file data/raw/world_cup/womens_world_cup_top4_seed.csv (curated from FIFA / Wikipedia public information).

Historical top4 seeds from local files data/raw/world_rugby/rugby_world_cup_top4_seed.csv and data/raw/world_rugby/womens_rugby_world_cup_top4_seed.csv (curated from World Rugby / Wikipedia public information).
Historical snapshots from official FIBA ranking pages and APIM endpoints (getgdapfederationsranking). Fallback to local seed if remote fetch fails.

source_name: FIBA Basketball World Cup Historical Results (Men/Women)
license_notes: Historical top4 seeds from local files data/raw/basketball/fiba_world_cup_men_top4_seed.csv and data/raw/basketball/fiba_world_cup_women_top4_seed.csv (curated from FIBA / Wikipedia public information).

source_name: IHF Handball World Championship Historical Results (Men/Women)
license_notes: Historical top4 seeds from local files data/raw/handball/ihf_world_men_handball_championship_top4_seed.csv and data/raw/handball/ihf_world_women_handball_championship_top4_seed.csv (curated from IHF / Wikipedia public information).

source_name: ICC Cricket World Cup Historical Results (Men/Women)
license_notes: Historical top4 seeds from local files data/raw/cricket/icc_cricket_world_cup_men_final_seed.csv and data/raw/cricket/icc_cricket_world_cup_women_final_seed.csv (curated from ICC / Wikipedia public information). Many editions have no official 3rd-place playoff; ranks 3-4 are sourced from semi-finalists when no official bronze match exists.
ICC rankings fetched from assets-icc.sportz.io ranking endpoint (comp_type=test|odi|t20, type=team) with client_id extracted from ICC rankings pages. Only top 10 is persisted in competition results.

source_name: World Athletics Championships Historical Podiums (Top 3 by Discipline)
license_notes: Local seed data/raw/athletics/world_athletics_championships_top3_seed.csv curated from public medal summary pages (editions >= 2000, currently 2001-2025). Top 3 retained per discipline and gender.
